attributes.action: Provide Mortgage and rent relief during the coronavirus pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: There are millions of people who will continue to go to work whilst sick as they can not afford to pay their rent or mortgages on statutory sick pay. By refusing to help these vulnerable people you are putting the lives of many at risk.
attributes.background: Assist Landlords and banks with providing rent and Mortgage relief during the coronavirus pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
